麢字的基本解释

麢
líng
古同“羚”。

麢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
兽名。

麢字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹿字部】　麢； 康熙笔画：28； 页码：页1512第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?郞丁切，音靈。【說文】大羊而細角。【玉篇】麢羊也。角入藥。【爾雅·釋獸】麢，大羊。【註】麢羊，似羊而大，角圓銳，好在山崖閒。【山海經】翠山，其隂多旄毛麢麝。俗省作羚。【寰宇志】安南高石山中出羚羊，一角，極堅，能碎金石。【韻會】麢角有圓蹙繞文，夜則懸角木上以防患。

考證：〔似羊而大，角細而圓銳〕　謹照爾雅原文改麢羊，似羊而大，角圓銳。
麢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
麢字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Deer Department] 　麢; Kangxi strokes: 28; Page number: page 1512 No. 03
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Yin Dingqie, the sound is good. [Said the text] Big sheep with thin horns. [Jade articles] The sheep also. Angle is used as medicine. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Yu, big sheep. [Note] The sheep are as big as a sheep, with rounded horns. Fortunately, they are resting on the cliffs. [Shanhai Jing] Cuishan, its overcast and shabby musk deer. Secular province for antelope. 【Universal History】An antelope emerges from the high rocky mountains in Annan. One corner is extremely strong and can crush gold and stones. [Rhyme Club] There are round and rounded writings on the corners of the temple, and the corners are hung on the wood at night to prevent trouble. Textual research: [Like a sheep but big, horns thin and round and sharp] 　 I would like to change the sheep according to the original text of Erya, like a sheep and big, with rounded horns.
